introWeb: This is the portal connecting partners to Nhat Tin Express service system.
authorizationContent:
For each connection to the development environment, there will be a key pair to access the system, including:
- username
- password
This key pair will be provided by Nhat Tin Express and transmitted in headers when the partner calls
webPortalContent: Login to the system to get Partner ID information
signInContent: API used to login to the NTX system via e-commerce platforms. The requirement is that the Client using the platform must register an account of the NTX system.
createOrderContent: By calling the API to NTX, pass the json param to the body according to the parameters described in the parameters section. This API if customer get ID location (Province/District/Commune) of NTX
createOrderVer2Content: By calling the API to NTX, pass the json param to the body according to the parameters described in the parameters section. This API if the customer gets the customer's location
trackingOrderContent: Order tracking API. Can track one or more bills of lading (maximum 30 codes, each code separated by commas).
pricingShippingCostContent: API for pricing and shipping cost
updateOrderToPartner: Update the order to the partner
webhooksContent1: As soon as the order has a new update, the NTX system will automatically send the update to the partner's system through a URL (callback link) that the partner sends to the NTX technician. Refer to the order status code table.
webhooksContent2: For example, the partner API callback is: https://apidoitac.sampmle.com/update-shipping. The parameters that NTX passes in the body to the partner. Documentation instructing the partner to manually convert the order status to automatically call the webhook:
webhooksContent3: Suppose the customer's order is “DH098989898” (the bill of lading code is “E99999999”) is updated “successfully delivered”
webhooksContent4: Data NTX will send to the callback link of the partner according to the content of the request
